pageContent: Background: After treatment for prostate cancer, multidisciplinary sexual rehabilitation involving couples appears more promising than traditional urologic treatment for erectile dysfunction (ED). The authors of this report conducted a randomized trial comparing traditional or internet-based sexual counseling with waitlist (WL) control.

metaData.source:
Development of clinical models for predicting erectile function after localized prostate cancer treatment
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/25056284/
